choices: A new gang has been formed #1
A new gang has been formed #2
A new gang has been formed #3
A new gang has been formed #4
1.content:
A man dressed in a red vest with a black shirt walked through a hallway it looked sort of worn and yet sort of new. he came to a mahogany door he turned the handle pushed the door open and went inside. Near the back of the room sitting behind a desk was a shadowed man whose face could not be seen.

Broley:Leader I've got something to report.

Leader:Your reports are always accurate and thanks to my strategy, influence and the fact that we have agents in every organization in this city including the Cops, we always know what goes on and thats why The Ranzards remain in control. So what have you got report?.

Broley:Well...
1.title: The Leader

choices: Let them continue to work for the Ranzards for now
Pull them back so the Ranzards have less men to control
11.content:
"What's happened Broley? did someone die or has Barnsley thrown in the red towel?" The leader asked

---Meanwhile---

"Sir" one of the henchmen said as he looked at the man in black "Capra's dead" The man in black laughed as he heard his hencman speak "I'm quite dissapointed to hear that" The henchman sunk back in fear "Well that means we can carry on with our operations. We managed to recruit twenty five percent of the Ranzards before we left" The figure in black smiled "good good. you may go now" The henchman nodded his head and quickly escaped the room.

"That was an amazing impression of me" Roz said as he exited the corner of the room. "Did you expect anything less" Capra replied as he removed his mask. "Now that everyone thinks I'm dead, I can finally get back at the Ranzards and take them over." "What about our new recruits?" Roz questioned
11.title: Capra

111.content:
Capra:Keep them working for the Ranzards.

Roz:Why?

Capra:The Leader is a genius just moving one percent would be like going up to the Ranzards front door and shouting SHOOT ME SHOOT ME. They need to stay.

Roz:We got a report that the Ranzards are making a move to assassinate Chief Barnsley.

Capra:Send some men in to stir things up but make sure they aren't seen and after thats done cause a little trouble down at the docks.

Roz:Yes sir.

Roz walked out of the door and closed it behind him.

Capra:This'll show those bastards who has power in this city.
111.title: Stiring things up

12.content:
Broley: A new gang has been forming around a small section of the city. A hang-out is under construction. As far as we can tell, not one of them has invaded our territory. From intelligence, we know that they are called the Dracon, and their leader, the Black Dragon. Supposedly, they have a rare scale, believed to be from some type of winged lizard. They stole it from a museum not far from here about three weeks ago. This scale, known as the Draconicus, is their most prized possession. They have transferred the remains of DNA from the Draconicus, and injected it into their blood.

Leader:And this concerns me how...?

Broley: Supposedly, the ones who have been injected have become stronger and tougher. They appear to have amazing hearing, and can move amazing distances with huge objects in short times.

The leader pondered for a few minutes.
12.title: The Dracon

121.content:
Leader: Send a diplomatic party. It's better that we appear friendly than have more enemies to have to fight.

Broley nodded and walked out of the room. He heads to the small room in the back.

"Jensen, Forley, you're with me. We're going to meet the new gang."

Broley and his two teammates get into a shiny car and drive off to Dracon territory.
121.title: Diplomacy with the Black Dragon

1211.content:
Broley, Jensen, and Forley stop the car near Dracon HQ. They walk a couple blocks then head into the alley. Eventually, they reach a building with a Japanese symbol on it. There are two 7 foot tall guys gaurding the door.

Broley and co. approached. The left gaurd held up a hand.

"Stop where you are. What business do you seek here?"

Broley showed his right hand. Imprinted on it was the mark of the Ranzards.

The two guards exchanged glances. A slight glow started to come from their eyes. The guards turned back.

"Peace or war?"

Broley put his hand down, and smiled.

"Peace."

The guards noticably relaxed.

"Come this way. Black Dragon will wish to see you.

Guards, Broley, and co. enter through the doors (which slam shut behind them).
1211.title: Getting in

12111.content:
Broley and co. follow the guards down a long, spiraling hallway. Open doors reveal tattooed men and women training, reading, injecting themselves, and doing many other things. One door reads "R&D" and is locked. Smoke fogs the small door window. Eventually the hallway stops. On the left is a door that says, "Office". On the right is a set of double doors that say "Gym". The guards point to the right, and all enter the gym.

The gym consists of many exercise machines, all used by tattooed men and women. In the middle is a huge pole, and attatched to the pole are a myriad of ladders, swings, and smaller poles. On the upper part, which is almost complete shadows, a person is sitting. As Broley, Jensen, and Forley approach the exercise pole (for so it's called), the two escorts exit and go back to the doors, and four similar men and two women surround them.

The biggest, a 6'8" man, breaks the circle and approaches the trio. He looks down at Broley and smiles, revealing jagged teeth.

"Broley Orville, is that you? You haven't changed much."

Broley looks up at the man and tries to remember him.

"Big Jim, is that you? I thought you died in that fire five years ago."

"Broley, you know I'm stronger than any fire ever burnt. I survived all right. When I got back to HQ, no one was there. I knew then that you had gone elsewhere. I travelled the city, searching for you for five years, when I was approached by Black Dragon. Naturally, I accepted the job, and here I am, second in command of the Dracon."

Suddenly, the person up high on the exercise pole jumped down and landed perfectly.

"You bear the mark of the Dracon well, Big Jim. I hear you three have a proposition. Let's go to my office."

It's Black Dragon, fearless leader of the Dracon, who is...
12111.title: A surprise

121112.content:
As they walked to her office, Broley took a good look at Black Dragon. She had a well-rounded body. Her hair was black, her eyese a light violet. She wore a tight-fitting black outfit. Tattoed across her body was a black dragon with purple eyes.

Soon, they were in her office. On one side were pictures of dragons, models of dragons, a big dragon collection. On the other side was nothing, except a small keypad. Black Dragon sat down at her desk and motioned to three chairs.
121112.title: Black Dragon

choices: Break into the Police station and free someone
1211121.content:
Black Dragon:What is your business with The Dracon?

Broley:I am Broley this is Jensen and Forley. The Leader wishes that we can form some sort of alliance.

Black Dragon:Interesting, but I absolute need proof of your loyalty.

Broley:Name it and its done.

Black Dragon:I want you to...
1211121.title: Proof of Loyalty

choices: The leader launches small raids against them...
13.content:
" A new gang has been formed" Broley said, the leader looked up and smiled "what are they called?" He asked calmly, Broley looked nervous when he answered back "Their called the Black angel security force, a government gang set up to bring order to the city, that's all we've got on them at them moment." " About time the government got involved, very well monitor them and see what they do..." "yes sir.."
Broley walked out leaving the leader... "BASF... hmmm"
13.title: the Black Angel security force

choices: the Deputy gives a full description of the situation
the Government wants to talk to the major
131.content:
BASF HQ, dark city airport.

The airport was one of the primary ways the Ranzards had been able to control Dark city the leader of Black angels chose the airport as a primary target and early in the morning had taken control using various methods of tactical approaches.

Now a fully working base for the Black angels the VTOL carrying the leader landed and out of it came Major Kourna, a veteran of many military and gang wars, he had been assigned to bring order to the police and to these gangs.

"let's begin" the major said to his deputy on the ground
131.title: enter Major Kourna

choices: we should set up snipers to take them out.
drop sleep gas on the place
1311.content:
Major Kourna:What's the situation?

Deputy:Well sir. We've taken the airport but we're under heavy fire. The Ranzards are using military grade weapons. They have bazookas, machine guns, grenades and well all of the other stuff they are using is on this list.

The Deputy handed Major Kourna a very thick wad of paper. He took one glance at it and handed it back ot the deputy.

Major Kourna:Where do they get this crap?

Deputy:Who knows sir.

Major Kourna:Well....
1311.title: Military grade weapons

choices: intelligence is set up at HQ
tanks are bought in to help the snipers
13111.content:
"we're gonna be sitting ducks on the low ground, use snipers to clear the buildings out if we can gain a secure area I'll call in tanks and various equipment in your orders are simple bring order to the city."
Immediately after the order most of the Ranzards notcied something different, "what's going...ARRGGHH!!!!" he sadi as he was shot in the head by the first sniper "got 1, hunting season is now open everybody let's push these guys away"
13111.title: hunting season

131111.content:
Major Kourna arrived at BASF HQ. An intelligence centre had been set up. A man walked up to the Major.

Intel:Sir as you can see intel is fully operational. But I have some bad news as well.

Major Kourna:What is it?

Intel:Well sir the about an hour after the Ranzards retreated the Airport was destroyed by an Tactical ballistic missile. Which was launched from an old underground military base.

Major Kourna:Damn it was anyone killed?

Intel:All of our soldiers were completely wiped out but no civliilians were in the vicinity.

Major Kourna:hmmmm. That's good but also bad at the same time. Make sure to inform all of the soldiers families.

Intel:Yes Sir. It seems that the airport is not the only one in Dark City plus all of the other exits out of the city are Ranzard controlled as well as the Mayors office and the Mayor.

Major Kourna:Dark City is not the place for a war. We need to get the police on our side I'll go down to the police station.
131111.title: Intel

1311111.content:
Police headquarters,

"Well, why have the Black angels requested to talk to us?" the cheif was already angry at the loss of a few recruits, the Major placed down breifcase and opened it where both him and the cheif were in view. Inside, a webcam along with a screen unfolded out and the face of Support commander and Adminstrative director Lucas appeared. "good morning chief, you know who I am so I'll jump straight to the point. Since the launch of a non-nuclear wolverine missile, the government has requested international help in the area. The UN today have said that the black angels will conduct a full operation to bring order with major armies, britain and america to name a couple, helping us." the Director said " Here's the deal, the UN forces have surrounded the city in a 5 mile perimeter nobody leaves or gets in unless they are called for by my paperwork. Th police work with the Black angels to bring direct order to the city and you can decide what to do with the leader once we catch him, if we catch him, what do ya say?"
1311111.title: administrative deal

choices: Later back at the Dark city
13111111.content:
Chief Barnsley thought the offer over for a minute.

Chief Barnsley:I accept you have my support.

Director Lucas:Good. Now if you'll excuse me I have a meeting with the Prime minister.

Director Lucas cut the transmission.

--------------------------

Later at the meeting in downing street. The Prime minister walked into the room where Director Lucas was sitting. The Major was sitting on his right.

Director Lucas:You wanted to see us sir?

Prime Minister:Yes I've invited you here for extremely important reasons. But first.

The Prime minister handed over to the major and Director Lucas each a file they open it up and saw a form.

Director Lucas:Official secrecy act documents.

Prime Minister:Sign them so we can proceed.

Director Lucas and the Major signed the documents and handed them over to the Prime minister.

Prime minister:By signing these documents you have agreed to keep what you hear in this room to yourselves. I don't have to tell you that what your about to hear is above top secret.

Director Lucas:What is it you want to tell us?

Prime minister:The real reason behind the existence of the BASF. You see eight years ago we were contacted by an alien race calling themselves the ancients. They're part of a group called the Ascended an alliance of alien race that have ascended to a higher plain of existence dedicated to the protection of discovery, non interference and free will in the universe. The technology they possess way beyond that of Earth. They told us of another group calling themselves the Lucian Alliance a group dedicated to the destruction of races that don't or won't worship them as gods. They're technology is the same level as the Ascended. Basically what they want is a tactician to turn the tide of the war. Now there is only one being in the universe that can do that.

Director Lucas:The Leader

Prime Minster:Bingo. This is were you and the BASF come in. You were created in hopes of catching the Leader. But obviously that's not going to happen. What we want you to do is now use your resources to persuade the Leader to come to us. So we can come to an agreement with him. Now go.

Director Lucas:Very well sir.

Prime minister:Remember we need him alive.

Director Lucas and the major stood up and left the room.
13111111.title: The real reason behind the BASF

131111111.content: It was the outskirts of Dark city about half way between the blockade and the first building, a major military base had been activated and almost immediately V-44 heavy transports (VTOL) had landed unloading not only some british challenger tanks but also some new weapons and equipment, silently it took off and a chinook took it's place, the major and his deputy stepped off "good to see you support com, what's the plan?" The support commander had been waiting " I've divided the areas up depending on fighting and civilian density" he had beckoned the major into the case where a map of the city was "the city centre is no support allowed along with the airports and the sea port, however the yellow allows limited support mainly from A-10's and sea harriers from our sea carrier, ark angel, green areas are the suburbs and areas up to the blockade line. We will have a howitzer along with Falling star operational within 24 hours along with the B2 bombers and stealth fighters to call in" the major looked shocked " don't tell me the PM allowed this sort of thing?" Lucas just looked at him and then smiled " our first objective is..."
131111111.title: divided up

1311111111.content:
While the attack on the power plant started the Director had ordered the 101st division to destroy or capture the oil fields, under command of Major Upa, Task force Juna was given clearance to begin...

(this is sort of an parrallel storyline to the main story)
1311111111.title: oil fields

choices: The soldiers go in the plant, stick together and walk into a trap
The soldiers go in the plant, split up and are picked off one by one
1311111112.content:
Major:Very well. OKAY EVERYONE OUR FIRST TARGET IS THE POWER PLANT LET'S MOVE.

All of the forces moved on the nuclear power plant.

-------------------------------

Later at the nuclear power plant.

Major:Damn it. It's a nuclear power plant. We have to be careful we can't fire a shot in there or the reactor will set off a chain reaciton and take us with it. OKAY MEN NO GUNS OR PROJECTILE WEAPONS OF ANY KIND.

All of the the soldiers put their grenades, rifles and other weapons on the ground. They drew batons.

Major:ONLY MELEE WEAPONS NOW THEY'RE GONNA BE HIDING IN THERE SO KEEP YOUR WITS ABOUT YOU. NOW LET'S MOVE.

The soldiers marched in the nuclear power plant.
1311111112.title: Nuclear power plant

13111111121.content: "Major this is Lucas, as of this moment I am giving a permit for projectile weaponms, one shot, one kill please, I can't use support weapons in the area" The soldiers changed weapons along with the mode for the guns " suppport com, I need J-star viewing on the power plant" "correct theres 100 men in the building at this moment majority are hanging around the reactor, this data is a little hasy thanks to that stupid uranium but you can walk in or find a different way around..."
13111111121.title: trap info

choices: The Major orders his men to fire
131111111211.content:
Major:We don't have choice but to spring it. Going around could let them to know we know and they would forumlate a new plan then we'd be screwed. I'l just have to hope for the best. Okay men move out.

After a few minutes the squad arrived in the reactor room it was dark. The lights were not on. suddenly the door shut behind them and the lights came on revealing over two hundred men with red vests and black undershirts. The vests had the ranzards logo on them. They had guns, machete's, sleep gas grenades and other stuff. A man wearing a black jacket with the ranzards logo on it came forward.

Man:Hello Major Kourna. I am Draven one of the Leaders Seven Lieutenants. Our wepoans were created for this place. The bullets ricochet off of man made material such as metal and plastic. But act like normal bullets would with organic mateiral. Besides exploding on contact with said organic material. You however....from just here I can see your men only have on bullet each. But we have many to unload into your corpses. Now say good bye Major and one other thing aim carefully because it could be the last time you do HAHAHAHAHAHA. If you surrender then I'll spare your men. But if you don't then I WILL KILL THEM ALL.

The Ranzards took aim so did the Majors unit. What does the Major do?
131111111211.title: Time to die?

choices: The Black angels call in reinforcements but half of the squad dies...
1311111112112.content: "well, diven I only have one thing to say, make sure that you never go up against a tactical squad" the major smiled " fire at will!!!!" Almost immedaitely the men on the floor of the majors squad were shot and the Black angels had easily taken cover and grabbed the ranzards weapons before one shot was fired, then all hell broke loose, the Draven was overwhelmed that 50 good men had been lost quicker then he had anticipated and was now shooting at the cover...
1311111112112.title: "never face a tactical squad"

choices: The major makes it out alive (all of his soldiers are dead)
The major dies (some of his soldiers survive)
13111111121121.content:
The Major called in reinforcements but as soon as they got in half of them were killed. It looked like a victory was the BASF's. But Draven was not finished yet.

Draven:EVERYONE BUT YOUR WEAPONS DOWN.

Everyone including the ranzards stopped shooting and looked at Draven. He had taken a live bullet and placed it in his gun and was pointing it at the reactor. Everyone including the major put their weapons down.

Major:Don't do anything your gonna regret.

Draven:Regret ha you fool. You think the leader would not have a back up plan. This place is a trap within a trap.

Major:What?!?!

Draven:That's right the metal this plant is constructed of was designed for this. When I shoot the reactor it'll explode take all of us and anything outside with it. But the metal will nullify the explosion so Dark City will be safe. Every Ranzard here knew of this and are ready to give their lives to serve the leader.

Major:Your insane

Draven:Long live the leader.

Draven shot the reactor and it began to explode. He was consumed by the explosion as were many Ranzards and BASF soldiers.
13111111121121.title: A trap within a trap

choices: the airport that was attacked by the missile.
131111111211212.content:
BASF carrier Ark Angel

"sir we have an explosion in area 23b at the nuclear power plant, no confirmed report at this moment... deaths 88% major kourna is one of them, orders?" the officer reported.
So the next act is played though Lucas " promote deputy Nakora to major , she at least lived here for a time and suggested against this. Change that red area to green now I think I also know the next target as well, it is..."
131111111211212.title: The loss

choices: Major Nakora and a few of her soldiers escape the base
1311111112112121.content:
The BASF arrived at the military base. Major Nakora was in command. Unfortunatly the base was underground. So they had to blow open the blast doors which were the only way in. The doors had blown open.

Major Nakora:Okay everyone storm the place.

The soldiers moved in. Major Nakora took the lead. When they got there was no movement except for her own. She shone her on a red mark on the wall. She followed it down to a corpse. It was a ranzard soldier. She shone her torch along the corridor it was filled with ranzard corpses.

Soldier:What the hell happened?

Major Nakora:I don't know but keep your wits about you.

Major Nakora and the soldiers continued into a hangar. Inside it was a giant tank with turrets on every side. Major Nakora went up some stairs into a control room. It was dusty. There were Ranzard soldier corpses in there as well. at least five of them. The terminal gave her basic access but she couldn't access the restricted file as they required extremely heavy ranzard level clearance. She enquired about the tank. The computer showed a file that said it was a ranzard weapon project called Heavy Storm. It was tank made of steel reinforced titanium that could hold up to fifty men. With each a job to do. It could withstand a direct hit from a nuclear missile and not have a scratch. It also shielded against radiation and harmful gases. It was also half finished.

Suddenly the computer cut out. She checked the mainframe but it was completely fried no data was left not even any back ups. Then one of the corpses rose up behind her. He was alive. He held his gun and aimed at her. He fired, but she dodged and took him down. He swallowed something and died.

Major Nakora:Damn it's a trap. I told that pompus idiot Lucas that the military base was a bad idea.

All of the corpses in the base stood up alive and well and a huge gun fight insued.
1311111112112121.title: Project Heavy storm

choices: the leader hears about the use of falling star
Nakora gives her report about the incident
13111111121121211.content:
"Lucas Is falling star online??" Nakora shouted into her mic "yes, you need use on the base?" Lucas's voice had come through "well, if you don't your gonna have only what I describe as zombies fighting in the streets" a sigh came through the voice as the soldiers began to move quickly towards the door " the transmitter has made contact you have two minutes until it hits the base, we're lucky the area is green"

A couple of minutes later major Nakora was standing 200 meters away from the base as the first satellite hit the base... the ranzards corpses were blown everywhere but only in a nearby area...
13111111121121211.title: falling star

choices: Later at the airport (The Ranzards haven't attacked yet)
131111111211212111.content:
Meanwhile somwhere in dark city. Broley walked into the Leader's private room/study. The Leader''s face could not be seen.

Leader:Yes

Broley:Sir the military base where we built the fake project Heavy storm has been blown up. By a weapon called Falling Star. We believe it to be an attack satellite of some kind.

Leader:It matters not. Everything they accessed in the computer was fake so even if they did manage to save any of it it's all fake the only real stuff was the basic access file on project heavy storm. So even if they did save the data and broke the Ranzard encryption it's all fake. Meanwhile the real project Heavy storm was finished months ago and is below this place in an underground bunker. That thing it's nearly indestructible plus they'll never get into it to hijack and it isn't link to any remote networks so it can't be hacked into. The basic file was an understatement when it said it survive nuke. That thing could survive the moon crashing into the earth. The BASF are going to the airport we destroyed. Take Heavy storm with the other forty nine guys to operate it and pay them a visit

Broley:Yes Sir
131111111211212111.title: Fake

choices: launch an A-10 raid against the tank
use an old anti tank gun to destroy the tank
1311111112112121111.content: "Major Nakora pull your troops away from the airport terminal" Lucas had appeared on her line "and why's that??" "Judging by J-star we ahve one fo those 'heavy storm' tanks coming towards you, I'm going to do something very extreme I thought I would never do..." Nakora had already moved her troops and tanks away from the terminal and across the airstrip "I've got a theory about that tank I want to try it out..."
1311111112112121111.title: it approaches

choices: Major Nakora wakes up in the hospital a few days later
13111111121121211111.content:
The A-10's approached Heavy Storm. It was advancing on the airport. The A-10's fired at it. A lot of smoke went up. It seemed like it had been destroyed.

PIlot#1:We got it.

The smoke cleared and Heavy storm was still moving and was unaffected by the attack.

Pilot#2:Impossible nothing could survive that kind assault.

Heavy Storm stopped.

Pilot#3:What happened?

An anti air missile launcher came out of Heavy Storm's front right. It fired three missiles. The A-10's were destroyed.

Major Nakora:Shit that thing's unstoppable.

Heavy storm's main turret targeted Major Nakora and her troops.

Major Nakora:Oh shit EVERYONE RUN.

All of the soldiers began running for their lives. Heavy storm fired. Nearly all of the soldiers were killed. Major Nakora luckily was just outside the blast radius and was blown into the rubble of the airport and received a concussion.
13111111121121211111.title: Failed

choices: Lucas and a small squad of commandos rescue the major.
131111111211212111111.content: The blackness began to to change to where she was in the background was talk " she's stable but not very well... you can interrogate her at any time" and then the fickleness of fate cleared her view to find her tied to a hospital bed with the ranzard second in command facing her " did you expect anybody else??" broley said "now I ahve a few bones to pick with you and your security force and your gonna tell me everything you know"
131111111211212111111.title: fickle fate

1311111112112121111111.content:
Broley walked over to the Major.

Broley:Morning Princess. I have a few questions I'd like to ask you but first I'd like to thank and congradulate you.

The Major looked confused.

Major:Thank and congradulate me why?

Broley:Thank you for helping us test Heavy Storms anti aicraft missle systems and congradulate you for surviving a near direct hit from Heavy Storm's main turret. Heavy Storm is currently in a bunker somewhere. Only the Leader know where it is. Anyway on to my questions. But first know that you have been injected with a truth serum. If you lie then the srrum in your body will detect this and make you feel pain no human being has ever experienced and it will only stop if you answer the truth. If you fail or refuse to do so then the pain will intensify a hundred fold. Now my first question. How does the BASF know where the ranzards main activity spots?. Not even our enemies know these things.
1311111112112121111111.title: Interrogation

13111111121121211111111.content:
" I don't know, the only person that can give you accurate answers is, well not me"
nakora
Broley was very surprised at that answer even though he had expected her to lie, whe wasn't in any pain and yet he couldn't believe that she didn't know something, there must be somethin that she knew about what was going on...

Broley then asked
13111111121121211111111.title: an answer

choices: " how much support does the BASF have?"
" Who is in charge of the BASF?"
131111111211212111111112.content:
" I'm only a major not a campaign planner I obey my orders from the higher ups"

Once again, no pain, this was worrying to Broley, how could a well run army have soldiers who knew very little, this woman had survived a blast from a indestructible tank and yet she didn't know what her faction was planning? Just who is in charge of the BASF?

" there's just one more question..."
131111111211212111111112.title: obey orders

choices: A few hours later the Major wakes up with no memory
1311111112112121111111121.content:
Major:They the support of the government and now Chief Barnsley and the DCPD.

Once again no pain.

Broley:Well that's all the question I wanted to ask. You'll be free to go in just a minute.

A man in a white coat came up to the Major and injected her with a serum. The Major started to feel dizzy.

Major:What was....that?

Broley:Oh just an amnesia serum. When you wake up you'll have no memory of this place this interrogation, or who you are and we have the only cure. Goodnight

The Major fell unconscious. Broley unstrapped her restraints and carried her out to an unmarked car.
1311111112112121111111121.title: Amnesia

choices: she heads and asks broley something
13111111121121211111111211.content:
Dark city seaport

The lady had just walked out of the warehouse, she didn't know who she was or why she was but though she didn't know it two people were watching her, one was out on board the aircraft carrier observing what she was up to was support commander Lucas who knew that she had amnesia and had ordered her not to be picked up. The other in an unmarked car waiting to see if she would find out or try to signal a VTOL was broley who was going to watch to see if she cam towards them.
13111111121121211111111211.title: It begins

choices: What's Lucas going to do about the Major
131111111211212111111112112.content:
Broley watched with interest as the amnesiac major walked away. He decided his work was done and drove off. He continued down the streets of dark city and stopped outside an office building. He parked in the underground garage which sealed behind him. He went in the lift and proceeded up to the fifteenth floor. He walked past many rooms and came to a door with the number 1428 in silver on it. He pulled out his key opened the door went in and locked it behind him. His apartment was a decent size. It was exactly how he wanted it. Not too big but not too cramped either. He went into his room flopped onto his bed and went to sleep.

Meanwhile downstairs in the main entertainment room with a plasma TV five Ranzards were gathered around it.

Ranzard#1:Man five thousand channels and nothing to watch.

Ranzard#2:Ahhhhh stop complaining lets just go out and get a movie.

Ranzard#3:I agree.

Ranzard4:I second that.

Ranzard#5:I third that.

Ranzard#1:Alright lets go to blockbuster.

The five ranzards walked out of the main doors and started walking towards blockbuster.
131111111211212111111112112.title: Renting a movie

choices: Nakora is extracted with out a problem
Nakora is extracted with ranzard problems
1311111112112121111111121121.content: On the ark angel however Lucas had watched for a few minutes and as she walked away something caught his eye, that unmarked car... It only took a few seconds to get a global hawk observer drone in the sky but by that time the car had vanished... "sir, the unmarked car's vanished your orders?" "reset it's course to follow Nakora, when she's in a wide open region get the chinook in there immediately and pick her up, then get her out of the way of the Ranzards outside the blockade" The officers around the bridge began to prepare for the extraction operation which was going to be a waiting game....
1311111112112121111111121121.title: global hawk

choices: The extraction unit is wiped out
13111111121121211111111211212.content:
The extraction operation was going well. It seemed like the Ranzards didn't care about the major anymore. They had gained her trust and she was coming with them. But as the reached the VTOL it exploded and before they knew they were surrounded by over fifty ranzard soldiers. One of them stepped forward he was wearing a bullet proof armour with the ranzard logo on it.

Ranzard:I am Kanen one of the Leaders seven Lieutenants. You have already met Draven. Now you thought we didn't care about her did you well we don't. We were sent to kill as many of you as possible. The BASF and the government shall learn what happens when you mess with the Ranzards. LEAVE NON ALIVE.

The Ranzards took aim.
13111111121121211111111211212.title: VTOL destroyed

choices: Kanen is bought in front of the leader
Lucas get's a transmission from the Prime minister
131111111211212111111112112121.content: " I suggest you reevaluate the next words" came a voice from a nearby alleyway "who's this??" the ranzards looked in the direction of the speaker and out stepped a military officer in a very civilian suit the only way you could tell where the medals, "so your the leader of the Black angels?? the leader will want you dead!!" the support commander only looked at lieutenant for a few seconds and then smiled as a sniper from nowhere fired, Kanen looked straight into the eyes of Lucas for a few seconds before crumpling to the floor his last words echoing in the area "...bastard" "not a bastard, a tactician who knows his side anybody else want to go the same way?" the ranzard thugs took one look at him and dropped their weapons and surrendered. The wind then began to pick up as the chinook arrived "let's go, we have a campaign to finish" As it took off Kanen's body began to move...
131111111211212111111112112121.title: another down...

1311111112112121111111121121212.content:
PM:Lucas We have a situaiton.

Director Lucas:What kind of situation?

PM:The Leader is retaliating for the death of Kanen. Ranzard Thugs have just appeared in every town, village and city in the country. The Leader has declared war on the government.

Director Lucas:Oh Fuck.

PM:SO I need you to do something. Giant tanks that the leader refers to as Heavy Storm are occupying the north of the British Isles including northern England. There are over five million of them.

Director Lucas:No weapon we have can even slow that thing down. How are we supposed to deal with five million of them?

PM:I leave that up to you.

The PM ends the transmission
1311111112112121111111121121212.title: Viva la revolucion

choices: the invasion is destroyed in a few minutes
13111111121121211111111211212121.content:
"welcome to an emergency meeting we have very little time what theories have we got?" the generals were looking stressed and even major nakora (who by this time had remembered everything) had got a theory "well, seeing as though the blockade at dark city can't be broken we need to find a different approach, looking at the technology we can use a few are quite interesting" one of generals said " air strikes are out of the question unless we use stealth and jammers" said the air force cheif
" perhaps not don't we have nano bombs ready?" the director asked, this shocked the meeting but then people started to think that this could work " we will also need the new nano carriers I had prepared remember I want one with it's crew eliminated"

A few minutes later...

The briefing room was deserted with only Nakora and Lucas "So this man broley is the second in command? hmmm.... Thank you for that information" "positive sir and may I say good luck with this invasion" she smiled and walked off
13111111121121211111111211212121.title: nano useage

choices: Hours later after the blockade has been destroyed
131111111211212111111112112121211.content:
Hours Later a general came to Director Lucas. He had a worried look on his face and Director Lucas knew it could only mean bad news.

General:Director Lucas. The tactics have failed the heavy tanks are still operational. The nano bombs had no effect the tanks are too tightly concealed even nano bots couldn't get in.


Director Lucas:FUCKING HELL COULD THIS GET ANY WORSE?

General:Sir The Heavy Storm tanks have left their positions in the cities leaving heavily armed ranzard thugs and they're all converging on one location.

Director Lucas:Where?.

General:Dark City. Even the blockade can't stand up to five million Heavy Storms.

Director Lucas:I'm afraid your right. The blockade is done for.
131111111211212111111112112121211.title: Converging

1311111112112121111111121121212112.content: "This is dissappointing director, the UN are shocked but understands that the troops could not survive, I'm glad that the sea blockade is still operational, on behalf of the UN I am changing your objective in Dark city, the government has been forced to allow dark city to become independant and we have been forced to contact the ancients for help, they have accepted in exchange for one thing" the new prime minister was looking stressed but she had been a great supporter of the black angels and then looked at the director " They want major nakora for one day... Your call and your new objective is to stop the leader from doing fire storm again"
1311111112112121111111121121212112.title: Ancients intervene

13111111121121211111111211212121121.content:
Director Lucas:We don't have a choice. Tell them we accept.

Prime MInister:Okay. I'll get right on it and may the force be with y...uh....PM out.

The PM cut the transmission. Within hours ancient ships had arrived and had and beamed the real Leader, Director Lucas and Major Nakora onto their flagship. A man in white robes appraoched the three.

Ancient:I am Olias Commander of the Ancient fleet. Welcoem aboard. You must be the famous leader we've heard so much about and you are Director Lucas and Major Nakora. We have brought you here to help us save the universe from the Lucian alliance. Come there is much to discuss.

The three followed Olias out of the bridge room.
13111111121121211111111211212121121.title: Beamed up.

choices: the Ranzards arrive quicker than expected
1311111112112122.content:
The airport terminal had been devestated by the missile but the rest of the landing strip was still up and running, the Ranzards had discarded the area thinking that the Black Angels weren't going to use it. "This F-15 support to Ark angel, the skies are cleared and we have air dominance in this area" Came the pilots transmission "roger that our chinooks and V-44 heavy transports are on the way, defend against all anti-air attacks"
THe noise of the air craft was deafening to anybody that were in the area. THe first Chinook to land had commander junas on board, a strict military commander who had served in Iraq for sometime...
1311111112112122.title: airport strike

14.content:
"Sir, theres a new gang in town, its been real slow in forming, but its rising up the charts rather fast. They call themselves the Cartelles. what should we do?" the leader faces his honest Broley and says "Right now? absoloutly nothing!" he then laughs and asks for Broley to bring him the newspaper.

***SCENE CHANGE: The cartelles***

a man wearing a black pinstriped sports coat, a gray vest, and red tie comes barging through a door almost knocking it of its hinges. the door leads into a hall way and the man is yelling like a cat whos' tail is stuck in the door. "WHERE IS HE!?" the man yells. A bystander turns around to see Don Cartelle (or "Switchblade" Cartelle.). the bystander turns out to be he right hand man, Craig Jukes. Craig asks, "Wheres who?"

"Switchblade" yells with fire in his eyes, "I'm looking for...
14.title: The Cartelles

15.content:
Leader:What's happened Broley did someone die or has Barnsley thrown in the red towel?.

Broley:Not exactly Boss, the cops conducted another raid on one of our meetings again.

Leader:Go on was anyone arrested?

Broley:No, but Capra's dead.

Leader:Serves the bastard right trying take over my
Gang. So how did he die?

Broley:Three shots the head, one in his heart and two in each of his lungs.

Leader:It's time we made move against the cops showed them that the Ranzards rule this City.

Broley:What shall be our course of action?

Leader:I want you to...
15.title: The Usuper is dead

151.content:
The Leader:There's a police convoy headed out of town its full of convicts mostly from rival gangs. I want you to take some soldiers and hijack it. Then bring to the docks and stick it in warehouse 2. I don't care about the gang members kill all of them but leave the cops alive.

Broley:Yes sir.

Broley walked out the door and down the hallway then descended down some stairs he went outside he got into a black car and drove out of the gates. He continued east and came to an abandoned building with it's windows boarded up. He turned down an alleyway and drove into an undergound garage. He got out of the car and came to a door with a red light above it. he stuck his hand into a slot near the door and the light turned to green and click was heard from the door. He pushed it open and it shut itself behind him.
He went into a room with a plasma screen TV that was hooked up to an X-box 360 and several guys wearing red vests and black t-shirts were gathered round it.

Ranzard 1:Alright I'm totally kicking your asses.

Ranzard 2:Thats because you chose the best guy.

Ranzard 3:Yeah and you keep enterin cheats when we're not lookin.

Ranzard 4:What he said.

Ranzard 1:Screw you guys its not my fault you guys suck at this game.

Broley:Enough shut it off we have a job now go get the others.

Ranzard 1:Yes sir.

Ranzard 1 shut the 360 off and walked over to Broley and the other Rannzards stood up and went up the stairs.

Broley:Is the chopper fixed?

Ranzard 1:Yes sir

Broley:Do we have a pilot?

Ranzard 1:Yes Carl can do it. Sir what's our mission.

Broley:We're going to hijack a police convoy. The plan is simple. You and a few others will take 5 cars and will take out the escorts and four other cars will box the in truck and bring it to a halt. Me and two others will take the chopper and provide air support. Clear?

Ranzard 1:Crystal sir.
151.title: The Plan

1511.content:
A few minutes after take off...
"errr... sir, we have some sort of aircraft coming towards us... HOLY SHIT!!!!" the pilot had responded " Black angel F-15, looks like they don't want us in the air, orders?" Broley wasn't there... he had parachuted the minute the pilot had detected the F-15, it only took a few seconds for the plane to reach and destroy the targe but broley knew that the Black angels were not going to be stopped by the missile...
1511.title: F-15 interception

152.content:
Leader:I want you to let Barnsley know that he's been a pain in my ass for the last time got it?.

Broley:Yes sir.

Leader:You'll find him at the community centre giving another one his interviews, Reassuring the publc that we wont be troubling the city much longer.

Broley:It shall be done

Leader: And I don't care how many soldiers or weapons you have to take just make sure that he's dead.

Broley:No problem Sir
152.title: Eliminating Barnsley

1521.content:
Meanwhile at a green building with a sign saying community centre was gathered a crowd and a man in Blue uniform was answering questions.

Reporter:Chief Barnsley, over here Pete Tussel Dark City examiner.

Chief Barnsley pointed to him.

Pete Tussel:Chief Barnsley what are you going to do about the Ranzards street gang who you had declared war on a few months ago?

Chief Barnsley:I assure you that me and my team are going to do anything and everything in our power to bring down the Ranzards and take the Leader into custody. Any other questions?
A woman held her hand up and Chief Barnsley pointed at her.

Reporter:Chief Barnsley, Barbra Stanley Dark City Times. The city has seen the police fail to bring the Leader of the Ranzards into custody time and again don't you think your fighting a losing battle?.

Chief Barnsley:No now I admit we may have failed to catch him in the past but he we will catch we have a few leads.

Barbra Stanley:But how do you know that these leads won't turn up dry like the others?.

Chief Barnsley:Now we won't know if these leads are solid but we will when we follow them.
1521.title: Barnsleys interveiw

choices: Chief Barnsley gets up first and he arrests Broley
Broley gets up first and more cops arrive and he retreats.
15211.content:
All of a sudden a shot is heard and everyone in the crowd got on the ground. Chief Barnsley gets his gun out and so do several other cops. Then hundreds of shots are heard and they ricochet of the community centre and some of the crowd are get hit.
Chief Barnsley ducks behind a cop car with a few other cops.

Chief Barnsley:Where the hell are they shooting from?

Cop 1:I can't tell.

All of a sudden a helicopter appeared and it sent a hail of bullets towards the car.
Another cop ducks behind the car.

Cop 2:They got a chopper.

Chief Barnsley:Yeah I can see that.

Then the helicopter stops shooting a retreats a distance.

Cop 1:They giving up?

Then the three of them hear a hissing sound they look under the car and see a stick of dynamite and run out from the car as it explodes. Then the helicopter returns and lands and someone gets off and the helicopter ascends a fair distance.
Chief Barnsley identify's him as Broley and walks towards him with his pistol. Broley withdraws his hand gun and points it at Chief Barnsley and so does the Chief and both of them walk in circles to the right.

Broley:Chief Barnsley you have been a pain in The Leaders ass for the last time.

Chief Barnsley:The Leader had my entire family executed and I'm gonna take him and his empire down and I'm gonna start with you.

Both of them fired at the same time and both of them fell to the ground.
15211.title: The Chiefs Vendetta

choices: Barnsley goes to the hospital to treat his wound
Barnsley tries to catch the sniper despite his wound
152111.content:
Chief Barnsley stands up holding his shoulder where he'd been shot. To his amazement Broley is lying on the ground injured as well. Barnsley could have sworn that he had missed but he didn't have time to worry about it now. The chief quickly handcuffed Broly. By this time several cops were already on top of Broly and taking him to the police car.

Before getting into the passenger seat of a cop car to ride to the hospital Barnsley notices a man with a sniper rifle dissappear from a roof at the end of the street.
152111.title: Broly's arrest

1521111.content:
Barnsley shrugged...whoever was up there wasn't any of his concern. He had to worry about getting to the hospital and getting his wound looked at.
As he headed towards the ambulance that had arrived, he saw the other police officers dragging Broly to the nearest police car. He never made it. A single shot rang out nd right after, Broly fell to the ground.
Cops and civilians ran for cover. Barnsley watched as a couple officers fell as well.

Suddenly, the air grew still. The crowd calmed.
Barnsley glanced at the building where he saw the sniper before...he saw nothing.
He gestured to a officer.
"Before the shooting, i saw movement on that roof over there.
Take some men with you and check it out."

The cop salutes and heads off. Barnsley gets into the ambulance and heads toward the hospital."
*why did that person kill the cops if he was after Broly* he thought.
He couldn't find an answer.
1521111.title: great expectations

choices: give this to one of the Ranzard gang...to give to the leader
show this to noone...hide it till i need it.
15211111.content:
A knock at the door. Barnsley glanced up to see the young officer he talked with earlier.
"Come in lad..the doctor here is almost finished with the stitches...right doc?"
T"he doctor nods..laces the thread another couple times and leaves the room.
"So did you find anything?"
The man nods nervously as he hands Barnsley a sheet of paper.

This is what it reads: To the Ranzard gang,
You time is finished. You have risen to power on the bodies of your competitors.
Now you shall rep what you have sewn.
Broly was only the first..to catch your attention.
More will follow him..unless you do as i say.

The leader is to reveal himself one month from now...at the pedestal in front of the community center.
Once there, he will hold up a red flag.
You will then stand still as i put a bullet through your forehead.
If these demands are not met, your people..cop, gangster and citizen alike will die.
One person every 4 hours.

I will be in touch.


"This is outrageous..the leader would never consent to this!"
Barnsley stood from his hospital bed..his shoulder throbbing in pain.
"Sir..you should rest..."
"Young man, i have another favo to ask of you...
please...
15211111.title: urgent news

info.brief_description: Make your own gang and ally or go to war with mine
info.description:
The city the gangs will be based in is called Dark city. Its a run down place city filled with crime. Now here's my gang.

The Ranzards
The Ranzards are the Most powerful gang in Dark city and they're soldiers are extremly skilled when it comes to battling it out with another gang.

The Leader
The Leader of the Razards goes by many aliases and keeps control by outsmarting and decieving his enemies and then destroying them. He is a brilliant stratigest and the reason the Ranzards have rarley been beaten in a war.

Broley
The Leaders second in comand and is the most loyal of any of the Ranzards and would never betray the Leader.

The Cops

Chief Barnsley
The chief of police in Dark city he and his police squad have been trying to find The Leader and bring him and the Ranzards to they're knees but every time they think they've got him it turns out to be a fake. He will do whatever it takes to bring any gang to they're knees. The Cops have 20,000 officers and they have been desperatly trying to recruit more officers so that they can outnumber and destroy The Ranzards.

Other members of the Ranzards will be revealed as the story progresses make your own gangs and do whatever you want. Dark city isn't Necessarily in America, plus if there are words that any Americans don't understand feel freedrop me a line and tell me. Remember I'm a British author.
